categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ezak was a male Jedi Initiate studying in the Jedi Order at the Coruscant Jedi Temple in the years leading up to the Clone Wars.

An orphaned male Force-sensitive, Ezak dedicated his formative years to learning everything he could about the Jedi Order. During his early childhood, Ezak was detected by the Order and taken to the Coruscant Jedi Temple to receive training in the ways of the Force at the Temple's academy. Entering into the Wolf Clan, Initiate Ezak became extremely skilled with a lightsaber, and was good at fixing technological devices because he loved technology.
